remarks:
Generalization rule for restricted quantification, with two quantifiers.  (Contributed by NM, 30-May-1999.) 

---

 Generalization rule for restricted quantification.  (Contributed by NM, 30-May-1999.)
statement:
rgen2.1 $e |- ( ( x e. A /\ y e. B ) -> ph ) $.
rgen2 $p |- A. x e. A A. y e. B ph $.
$d A y $.
$d x y $.
